entries.title: Justice Department sues Google over dominance in online advertising
entries.description: The Justice Department filed its second lawsuit against search giant Google Tuesday, this time over the company's dominance in online advertising.

entries.title: Remember Zoom-bombing? This is how Zoom tamed meeting intrusions.
entries.description: The success of reducing Zoom-bombing shows how making technology less easy to use can make you safer.

entries.title: Google to stop exempting campaign email from automated spam detection
entries.description: The short-lived program was introduced amid a GOP pressure campaign blaming the technology giant for the party’s poor fundraising performance.

entries.title: Ex-Twitter engineer tells FTC security violations persist after Musk
entries.description: Concerns about Twitter’s security soared after an incident in 2020 when teenagers breached Twitter’s internal systems and tweeted as Musk, Barack Obama and others.
